extendedInfo.description: Includes:Check Your AccountRenew ItemsPlace HoldsSearch for Books, Movies, MusicAsk a LibrarianOne-click Access to Overdrive eBooks and Audio BooksLocation, Hours, and Contact Information Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Flickr, and BlogsCalendar & Events	Homework Help from Tutor.com

reviews.title: I wish it worked
reviews.comment: I was excited to find this app since I\'m an avid library patron.  Unfortunately, most of the app is broken.  When I click on \"My Account\", I get an error and cannot see any of my account details.  There is no place to enter my library id or password.  Also, when I search for books, a list of matching books does appear, but selecting a book takes me to a blank page.  I cannot see any information about the book.  If they got these features working, it would be a great app.  As it stands now, the app is unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: Ian, you should try reinstalling.  This app works like a CHAMP on my Droid phone.  I can check my account, search the catalog, and all the other listed features with ease.
reviews.author: A Google User
